S02dhvajkeu:3: namo bhagavate dhvajāgra rājāya tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya tadyathā /
S02dhvajkeu:4_0: jaya jaya vijaya vijaya jayavāhini-sam gari prabhañjani prabhañjani sarva śatruṇām
S02dhvajkeu:4_1: jambhaya jambhaya stambhaya stambhaya mohaya mohaya bhagavati jayavāhini mātha mātha
S02dhvajkeu:4_2: pra-mātha pra-mātha grasa grasa hasa hasa huṃ huṃ lambodari trinetre caturmukhe caturvaktre
S02dhvajkeu:4_3: catur daṃṣṭre catur bhuje asi musala khaḍga triśūla vajra dhāraṇīrakṣa rakṣa mām /
S02dhvajkeu:5: bhagavati hana hana daha daha paca paca mātha mātha pramātha pramātha huṃ huṃ phaṭphaṭbhañja bhañja sarva śatrūṇām /
S02dhvajkeu:6: dhvajāgra keyure tisṭhat tisṭhat triṭa ulkā dhāraṇi trailokyanātha vidhvaṃśaya
S02dhvajkeu:7: para sainya rakṣa rakṣa māṃ cala cala cili cili culu culu kala kala kili kili kulu kulu muncaṭṭa hāsaya vidhvaṃśaya parasainya bhramaya /
S02dhvajkeu:8: buddha satyena dharma satyena saṃgha satyena satya vādināṃ satyena buddha satyāmatikrama dharma satyāṃ atikrama saṃgha satyāṃ atikrama satya vādinaṃ satyamatikrama /
S02dhvajkeu:9_0: lambodare kuṭṭa kuṭṭa kuṭṭya kuṭṭya rudra mānaya biṣṇu mānaya candra sūrya mānaya
S02dhvajkeu:9_1: trailokya adhipatya mānaya sarva devo mānaya sarva yakṣa rākṣasa gandharva kinnara
S02dhvajkeu:9_2: mahoraga mānaya vidhvamsaya mama sarva śatru vaḥ rangha rangha ranghāpaya ranghāpaya
S02dhvajkeu:9_3: jvala jvala puṣpa mālini liḍhi liḍhi triṭa triṭa bhṛkuti mukhaḥ parasainya kurucchedana
S02dhvajkeu:9_4: karaṇha ha hi hi hu hu he he riṇi riṇi riṇā māte jayantu dhvaje /
S02dhvajkeu:10: buddhāvalokite rakṣa rakṣa mama bhagavatāvalokite svāhā /
S02dhvajkeu:13: sarva graha nakṣatra dā me karaṇa svāhā /
